headline: Energy Transition Today - Green Hydrogen Growth Driven By Global Sustainability Trends
summary: The recent report by Research and Markets highlights the rapid growth potential of the global green hydrogen market, projected to expand from $9.09 billion in 2024 to $134.86 billion by 2030 at a CAGR of 56.75%. The market's expansion is driven by the rising applications of green hydrogen and increasing sustainability and environmental concerns, with Europe leading the charge due to ambitious climate goals. Meanwhile, the Asia-Pacific region emerges as the fastest-growing area, driven by...
